entry.summary: Re @jack @Cernovich @annecollier @eirliani @podesta_lesley No, it is not. When Ella Irwin, who now runs Trust & Safety, joined Twitter earlier this year, almost no one was working on child safety. She raised this with Ned & Parag, but they rejected her staffing request. I made it top priority immediately. @ellagirwin
